title: Generate Commercial Invoice for International Shipment
description: An international order is being shipped, and it requires a commercial invoice for customs purposes.

tasks.description: Retrieve the details for the international order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the order and its items.

tasks.description: For each item, verify the country of origin, value, and Harmonized System (HS) code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all customs-related data is present and accurate.

tasks.description: Generate the commercial invoice document with all required information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates a complete and accurate commercial invoice.
